mapper.select: select * from detail_review_view order by r_regdate
select nvl(count(*),0) from detail_review_view where m_idx=#{m_idx}
mapper.update: update c_review set r_cot=#{r_cot}, c_idx=#{c_idx}, r_grade=#{r_grade}, r_pwd=#{r_pwd}, r_ip=#{r_ip}, r_regdate=sysdate where r_idx=#{r_idx}
mapper.select: select r.*, (bad+notBad+soso+likes+god) as total from ( select nvl(avg(case r_grade when 1 then count(*) end), 0) bad, nvl(avg(case r_grade when 2 then count(*) end), 0) notBad, nvl(avg(case r_grade when 3 then count(*) end), 0) soso, nvl(avg(case r_grade when 4 then count(*) end), 0) likes, nvl(avg(case r_grade when 5 then count(*) end), 0) god from c_review where c_idx=#{c_idx} group by r_grade ) r
select nvl(count(*),0) from c_review where to_char(r_regdate,'YYYY-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-dd')
